str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Trustworthy, faithful, believing. From peitho; objectively, trustworthy; subjectively, trustful.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Singular
Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From a presumed derivative of histemi; to set fast, i.e. to turn resolutely in a certain direction, or to confirm.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Probably from phule through the idea of isolation; to watch, i.e. Be on guard; by implication, to preserve, obey, avoid.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From, away from. A primary particle; 'off, ' i.e. Away, in various senses.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
